content.correctAnswer: An algorithm that sorts a data set in a short time
wrongAnswers: An algorithm that will work for any data set
An algorithm that accepts any data type

content.question: What is concatenation?
wrongAnswers: Accessing a certain character of a string
Accessing a range of characters of a string
Finding the length of a string

content.question: Is the read-write limit of solid-state media likely to affect the gamer?
content.correctAnswer: No, the read/write limit is usually very high
wrongAnswers: No, the gamer will not be writing to the medium
Yes, the gamer will hit the limit very quickly
Yes, the gamer will hit the limit eventually

content.question: What does a device driver do?
content.correctAnswer: Helps the operating system to understand data from devices
wrongAnswers: Provides power to devices in the computer system
Allows the user to perform a specific task
